nodes.text: Making of a Witch is an article written by Morrie Mullins as a tie in to the Living Force adventure Hunting the Wyrd. It was published on the Wizards of the Coast website on September 2, 2004 and gave a first hand account by the Tarasin Besaama about how she became a member of the Wyrd. This was followed by roleplaying statistics for Besaama.
